home.text: Hi! I'm Silvina. I love creating responsive web apps using React and Node.

about.bio: As a Full Stack Developer familiar with backend technologies, I mostly focus on the frontend. I'm passionate about building scalable and accessible web applications that solve problems. I strongly believe my background in book publishing and translation has given me invaluable tools that help me write clean code, communicate well and think critically.
about.extra: Outside of coding, I enjoy woodworking and travelling.

contact.text: If you are interested in knowing more about me or my work, send me a message
